name: ITP - 141 - Safety from Falling Barriers
template name: ITP - 141 - Safety from Falling Barriers Rev B

name: Acceptance / Conformance Criteria - The Contractor shall verify the setting out position, level and line of the bridge, prior to commencing construction. The Contractor shall advise the Engineer of any apparent anomalies identified.
Acceptance / Conformance Criteria - Prior to starting works, Ensure that the construction drawings are both IFC and the Current Version.
Acceptance / Conformance Criteria - Shop drawings to be approved by Engineer
Verifying Document - Record of Approval, Approved Shop Drawings
Acceptance / Conformance Criteria - Include correspondence of approved ITP.
Verifying Document - Record of Approval, Approved ITP
SECTION 2 – MATERIAL, PERSONNEL & THIRD PARTY APPROVAL
Acceptance / Conformance Criteria - All panels to be part of Alsteel Defender Fence system unless instructed otherwise.
Acceptance / Conformance Criteria - All steelwork to be hot dip galvanised to achieve HDG600.
Acceptance / Conformance Criteria - All steelwork to be grade 300 minimum.
Acceptance / Conformance Criteria - M12 4.6 HDG minimum 150mm embedment.
Acceptance / Conformance Criteria - All repairs to hot-dipped galvanised materials to be as per manufacturer's specifications or designer's instruction.
Acceptance / Conformance Criteria - Maximum centre to centre spacing of posts to be 2445mm.
Acceptance / Conformance Criteria - Minimum 1100mm height of posts.
Acceptance / Conformance Criteria - Maximum 100mm gap between ground level and first horizontal member.
Acceptance / Conformance Criteria - Standard Alsteel Base Stub footing mounted on foundation with 4/M12 4.6 HDG Bolts @ 90x110 spacing, minimum 150mm embedment.
Acceptance / Conformance Criteria - Minimum 65x65x1.6mm SHS posts.
Acceptance / Conformance Criteria - Returns to be minimum 520mm wide with 90x90 HDG base plate bolted to foundation with 4/M12 4.6 HDG Bolts @ 50x50 spacing, minimum 150mm embedment.
Acceptance / Conformance Criteria - Maximum centre to centre spacing of posts to be 2445mm.
Acceptance / Conformance Criteria - Minimum 2020mm height of posts.
Acceptance / Conformance Criteria - Maximum 100mm gap between ground level and first horizontal member.
Acceptance / Conformance Criteria - Standard Alsteel Base Stub footing mounted on foundation with 4/M12 4.6 HDG Bolts @ 90x110 spacing, minimum 150mm embedment.
Acceptance / Conformance Criteria - Minimum 65x65x2.5mm SHS posts.
Acceptance / Conformance Criteria - Returns to be 520mm wide with 90x90 HDG base plate bolted to foundation with 4/M12 4.6 HDG Bolts @ 50x50 spacing, minimum 150mm embedment.
Acceptance / Conformance Criteria - Ensure all items have been surveyed and records are assembled for asbuilting
Acceptance / Conformance Criteria - Create a set of Redline Drawings for Asbuilt creation noting all changes and departures in red pen.
Client Final Inspection - the signature below verifies that this ITP has been completed in accordance with the Specifications and verifies lot compliance.
